text: @realDonaldTrump Isn’t that what you promised 4 years ago? Since you got in the world’s lost respect for the US, the country is more polarized than the civil war, you’ve cut social safety nets leaving us vulnerable to covid19, the economy is in the shitter, and protesters have you bunkered. #maga
